fields.name: Kyouka Fuushi (C1)
fields.value: Shunsuiken DMG is increased by 40% against opponents with 50% HP or less.

fields.name: World Source (C2)
fields.value: [RECOMMENDED] Namisen's maximum stack count is increased to 5. When Kamisato Ayato has at least 3 Namisen stacks, his Max HP is increased by 50%.

fields.name: To Admire the Flowers (C3)
fields.value:
Increases the Level of Kamisato Art: Kyouka by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Endless Flow (C4)
fields.value: After using Kamisato Art: Suiyuu, all nearby party members will have 15% increased Normal Attack SPD for 15s.

fields.name: Bansui Ichiro (C5)
fields.value:
Increases the Level of Kamisato Art: Suiyuu by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Boundless Origin (C6)
fields.value:
After using Kamisato Art: Kyouka, Ayato's next Shunsuiken attack will create 2 extra Shunsuiken strikes when they hit opponents, each one dealing 450% of Ayato's ATK as DMG.
Both these Shunsuiken attacks will not be affected by Namisen.
